text: almond milk has quickly become one of
the most popular plant-based milks
surpassing me even soy milk and it's a
wonderful dairy-free alternative and if
you haven't made your own you're missing
out on so much start with one cup of raw
almonds and one cup of boiling water if
you have the time you can soak your
almonds in four cups of water in the
fridge overnight I'm just going to let
this sit in the blender until the nuts
become slightly softened which will take
about half an hour so it's been half an
hour and my almonds are just softened
enough I'm going to add half a teaspoon
of vanilla extract and three cups of
water and then blend this on high for
about two minutes
I think we are there oh this is so
beautiful now we're going to strain this
through a fine-mesh sieve almond milk is
so great with breakfast cereals
oatmeal's smoothies okay and this will
be good for about five days or so
definitely give it a shake before you
use it because it separates so even if
you're not sticking to a dairy-free diet
try homemade almond milk just to mix up
your milk routine
hi and thanks for watching if you'd like
